title: Where are the 3 PlayStation Rumors, GREG?! - KFGD 03.31.22
description:
GamesBeat's Jeff Grubb comes to KFGD to talk about where those three PlayStation rumors went, Greg runs Tim through wtf is wrong with Marvel's Avengers, and Tim gets mad at the news and walks off.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:52 - Jeff Grubb and the 3 PlayStation Rumors
00:12:49 - Housekeeping
Gamescast Review Scale
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, FargoBrady, & Pranksy
The Roper Report   -
00:14:09 - WTF is going on with Marvel’s Avengers? Ryan Leston @ IGN
00:25:45 - Xbox Game Pass Introducing a Family Plan, Jez Corden @ WindowsCentral
00:32:10 - Elden Ring’s Tekken Mod, Darryn @ GameSpot
00:36:22 -  Ad
00:37:25 - Sonic shoes
00:38:30 - Netease Buying Quantic Dream, Tom Henderson @ exputer
00:46:10 - Sony’s Firesprite making a AAA Horror Game, Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:49:35 - Xbox Keeping Share to Twitter Afterall, Taylor Lyles @ IGN
00:52:44 - Moss Book II Reviews?
00:54:10 - Out today
00:59:12 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Bless
